snippet: Azerbaijan shot down and destroyed an Armenian military helicopter in the Nagorno-Karabakh region on Wednesday, the countries’ defense ministries said.
abstract: Azerbaijan shoots down and destroys Armenian military helicopter in Nagorno-Karabakh region, threatening to set off another cycle of violence between the two South Caucasus neighbors over Nagorno-Karabakh region.
lead_paragraph: Azerbaijan shot down and destroyed an Armenian military helicopter in the Nagorno-Karabakh region on Wednesday, the countries’ defense ministries said.
